Package seamfinding.energy

Class DualGradientEnergyFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • seamfinding.energy.DualGradientEnergyFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnergyFunction
    public class DualGradientEnergyFunction
extends Object
implements EnergyFunction
    Dual-gradient implementation of the EnergyFunction interface for Picture objects.
    See Also:
    EnergyFunction, Picture
